body.p: This document includes the test case description topics from the various test cases. It serves as a catalog of test cases.
If you create a new test case please add a reference to the test case description topic here.
The source for these test cases is available on GitHub as .
body.note: This map also serves as a test of DITA 1.3 cross-deliverable links as it has cross-deliverable links to topics in the context of other root maps, either simply to relate the various test cases together or as a side effect of including test case description documents that themselves contain cross-deliverable links.
